jhelp.gui.dnd

Class ComponentDragSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.gui.dnd.DragSource
      • jhelp.gui.dnd.ComponentDragSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener

    public class ComponentDragSource
extends DragSource
implements java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    Drag source generic for a component

    Last modification : 2 fevr. 2009
    Version 0.0.0
    Author:
